# Registers

## SFR

_(standard 8051 SFRs are in italic)_

- _0x80 = P0_
- _0x81 = SP_
- _0x82 = DPL_
- _0x83 = DPH_
- _0x87 = PCON_
- _0x88 = TCON_
- _0x89 = TMID_
- _0x8A = TL0_
- _0x8B = TL1_
- _0x8C = TH0_
- _0x8D = TH1_
- _0x90 = P1_
  * b1 _(P1.1)_ = LED output (0 = on, 1 = off)
- _0x98 = SCON_
- _0x99 = SBUF_
- _0xA0 = P2_
- _0xA8 = IE_
- _0xB0 = P3_
- _0xB8 = IP_
- 0xBC = Interrupt vectors base address? (8..15)
- _0xD0 = PSW_
- _0xE0 = ACC_
- _0xF0 = B_

## XFR

_(the addresses are specified as addresses in XDATA)_

### 0xF000-0xF0FF

- See [USB](usb.md#registers)

### 0xF100-0xF1FF

- 0xF110 = /
- 0xF111 = /
- 0xF112 = /
- 0xF113 = /
- 0xF121 = /
- 0xF122 = /
  * b5 = ~clkcon1a
- 0xF123 = /
  * b0~b3 = ~clkcon1b
- 0xF125 = /
- 0xF126 = /
- 0xF127 = /
- 0xF128 = /
- 0xF12F = /
- 0xF140 = /
- 0xF141 = /
- 0xF142 = /
- 0xF143 = /
- 0xF144 = /
- 0xF145 = /
- 0xF146 = /
- 0xF147 = /
- 0xF148 = /
  * b0 = R/B# pin state
  * b1 = DQS pin state
- 0xF14C = / gpio out?
- 0xF14D = /
- 0xF14E = /
- 0xF14F = /
- 0xF150 = /
- 0xF151 = /
- 0xF161 = /
- 0xF176 = /
- 0xF177 = /

### 0xF200-0xF2FF

- See [NANDif](nandif.md#registers)

-------
